code:
%%{Infra_IngressController}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-08.01 — Ethics Evaluation Flow (Infra_RedisCache)

[Infra_WorkerNode] --> PENDING : AlignmentChecked (Infra_LoadBalancer)
note right of PENDING
  Ethics evaluation initiated  
  • triggered by new PoC or Proposal event  
  • fetch rubric and Manifesto version  
  • assign evaluator (Infra_IngressController)
end note

PENDING --> EVALUATING : EvaluationStarted
note right of EVALUATING
  Process input through multi-layer rubric:  
  • quantitative: resonance, alignment  
  • qualitative: intent, externalities  
  • hybrid AI-human scoring possible
end note

EVALUATING --> UNDER_REVIEW : ScoreComputed / RequiresHumanReview
note right of UNDER_REVIEW
  If confidence < threshold, escalate  
  • peer review or ethics board confirmation  
  • discussion / comments appended  
end note

EVALUATING --> APPROVED : EthicsPassed (Infra_EtcdCluster)
EVALUATING --> REJECTED : EthicsFailed (Infra_EtcdCluster)

UNDER_REVIEW --> APPROVED : Confirmed / ConsensusReached
UNDER_REVIEW --> REJECTED : EthicsViolationConfirmed

APPROVED --> ATTESTATION : AttestationIssued (Infra_LoadBalancer)
note right of ATTESTATION
  Issue ethics attestation (Infra_LoadBalancer)  
  • stored in PoCI (Infra_EtcdCluster)  
  • feeds resonance scoring (Infra_RedisCache)  
  • updates metrics (Infra_RedisCache)
end note

ATTESTATION --> [Infra_IngressController] : EvaluationClosed

REJECTED --> FLAGGED : FlaggedForViolation
FLAGGED --> GOV_NOTIFY : GovernanceAlertRaised (Infra_RedisCache)
GOV_NOTIFY --> [Infra_RedisCache] : EthicsCaseLogged

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
PENDING --> FAILED : InvalidInput / RubricMissing
EVALUATING --> FAILED : ModelError / Timeout
FAILED --> [Infra_LoadBalancer] : EvaluationAborted

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PENDING,EVALUATING,UNDER_REVIEW,APPROVED,REJECTED,ATTESTATION,FLAGGED,GOV_NOTIFY,FAILED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 Infra_RedisCache 和 Infra_LoadBalancer。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Infra_RedisCache 和 Infra_LoadBalancer'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Infra_IngressController 和 Infra_EtcdCluster 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Infra_IngressController 和 Infra_EtcdCluster'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Infra_EtcdCluster 和 Infra_LoadBalancer。

然后，流程会走到 Infra_RedisCache 和 Infra_RedisCache。

用户在这里会遇到 Infra_RedisCache 的分支。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 Infra_RedisCache处理。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Infra_RedisCache处理'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
